Description: A set of action buttons to start a conversation that is focused on specific topics or actions, like making a plan or creating an image.
Avoiding conversation breakdowns by providing possible actions or commands.
Avoiding conversation breakdowns by providing possible actions or commands.

restart conversation entirely in case of breakdown 
Description taken from (Traubinger et al. 2025)

Description: Inclusion of contextual information such as the time, date, and sender associated with chat messages, displayed above or below the message.
A possibility to upload extra information in form of documents or media. It can also be a request for specific actions of chatbot, like generating an image or a story.
Notes: new class, to be refined/split after collection of instances

Relation: maybe related to additional input (e.g. can be in the same menu)
Description: A request for how the chatbot should generate answers, e.g. answering "thinking" mode versus giving a fast response.
A shared graphical or text-based workspace for collaboration, e.g. for writing code or drawing together with the chatbot.
Suggestions for completion of the chat message when typing a request. This feature is also found in search engines.
Notes: New class only seen in ChatGPT (webview) so far
Comment: Edge case: when asked for symptom, a larger window opens that lets you search for symptoms, which has an autocomplete option.

Description: Displaying outputs from chatbot and user, most often as speech bubbles.

includes disclaimers
